ygData.msgSnippet: (Suukie was repaired at Plintissa s base earlier) Suukie was thrown backwards past the reach of Stinkbomb s tail by the shots, all other shots missed him

(Suukie was repaired at Plintissa's base earlier)
Suukie was thrown backwards past the reach of Stinkbomb's tail by the shots,
all other shots missed him because of Stinkbomb's Heavy Blaster Rifle
ripping through him...he fell to the bridge....then said: "you betrayed me
first..." then he went into stasis lock, his mech fluid
everywhere..........Plintissa came walking up.. "what have you done you
IDIOTS!.." she screamed..... "you slag sucking pieces of slag! he tried to
help you and you fired at him!.....Plintissa wrapped a tentacle around the
Heavy Blaster Rifle, jerking hard enough to fling it from Stinkbomb's
hand.....she picked up Suukie in one tentacle and hoisted him back to her
base.........and threw him in the CR Chamber, again!.....
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, May 26, 2000 6:28 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Ramhorn/Stinkbomb:
>
>
>
>     Stinkbomb, half-dead (even more) from Ramhorn's charge, which luckily
the
> blast was almost to far away to hit him, though his once light armor was
now
> a charred black, half of his left optic missing, leaking mech-fl all over.
> Seeing Suukie approach, he raised his rifle, waiting until Suukie stepped
up
> to him and fired at his middle.  Lauguidhing, since he had a big huge hole
in
> his middle (which, will undoubtedly kill him), the lasers merely hitting
the
> wall behind him (though pieces of the wall piercing into his back,
Stinkbomb
> was way gone so he couldn't even feel it).  Not even wondering how Suukie
> mystically got repaired, he shoved his heavy laser rifle up to diagonally
at
> the bottom of Suukie's chin (though a few millimeters away), pulling the
> trigger repeatedly, slashing his seringed and very deadly tail up at the
> middle of Suukie's chest.
>
> -----------
>
>     Ramhorn, stepped into the armory of the Ark, not seeing anyone on the
> way.  -Dang, it's a ghost ship- the temporarily insane robot thinking,
coming
> back into reality, no longer crazy.  "Stinkbomb, by Primus, what have I
> done!" he yelled, grabbing a missile launcher and running as fast as his
> damaged legs could carry him, each 'step' banging against the 'ancient'
metal
> flooor, stopping at the door of the Ark gradually, the door slid up
> automatically, the Maximal running in, seeing the fight between Suukie.
> Yelling, "Stinkbomb, hold on, I'll kill the traitor!", he raised the
missile
> launcher, stopping 6 feet behind Suukie, firing off a rocket at the
middile
> of his back, swearing in ancient Cybertronian (a way Ramhorn likes to show
> off to everyone).
>
